rules.name: ecombot-telegram-service
rules.description: Telegram Bot for e-commerce with admin panel, built with Aiogram 3, SQLAlchemy (async), and Poetry.
commands: Require type hints throughout the codebase
Use Aiogram 3.x for Telegram bot interactions (handlers, keyboards, middlewares)
Use SQLAlchemy with asyncpg for asynchronous database operations
Follow layered architecture: bot (presentation), services (business logic), db (data access), core (infrastructure)
Use Pydantic for data validation and configuration management
Implement centralized message management for i18n support
Ensure database sessions are managed via middleware or context managers
